amendatorysection.para: It is the intent and purpose of sections 29-4201 to 29-4207 to authorize the usage of audiovisual court appearances and certain district court arraignments by writing in criminal proceedings consistent with the statutory and constitutional rights guaranteed by the Constitution of the United States and the Constitution of Nebraska.

annotation.para: This section demonstrates that the Legislature did not intend to allow written arraignments filed under section 29-4206 to supersede Nebraska's criminal procedure statutes. State v. Liston, 271 Neb. 468, 712 N.W.2d 264 (2006).
